name: FPV Air 2
description: FPV Air 2 is a quadcopter flight simulator for serious FPV racing pilots who want a tool for meaningful/realistic flight practice in any weather.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or AMD Athlon X2 2.7 GHz Graphics: ATI Radeon 3870 or higher, Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2000 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
